author: namit
msg: HIVE-668. add UDFs abs, ascii, repeat, lpad, rpad, space, substring (Emil Ibrishimov via namit)

author: slaws
msg: TUSCANY-3173 remove the contents of thread local storage when the webapp shuts down. If you don't remove it the thread local storage will hold an object which, via its class, points to the WebAppClassloader. With a container with pooled threads this pins the classloader so it can't be GCd

author: mikedd
msg: remove try/catch from TestSerialization testcase. Try/catch in testcases can obscure the real problem.

author: davisp
msg: Updated local_dev.ini build target as per Noah's suggestion.
